title: Spacious 3 Bedroom 2 bath Apartment Available Now!
posting_body: ['Hayward CA 94541  $2,750.00/mo', 'KEY FEATURES', 'Sq Footage: 1000 sqft.', 'Bedrooms: 3  Beds', 'Bathrooms: 2 Baths', 'Parking: 1 Car Port /  1 Open space', 'Lease Duration: 1 Year (See Details Below)', 'Deposit: $2800.00', 'Pets Policy: flexible', 'Laundry: Washer and Dryer on site', 'Property Type: Two Story Unit', 'DESCRIPTION', '________________________________________', 'Available Immediately, $2,750.00 rent, Upstairs Apt , 3 Spacious bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, Completely Remodeled .', 'Newly installed hardwood floors, brand new tiled bathrooms, huge living room, new blinds, freshly painted, ceiling fans, canned lighting.', ' 1 car garage port 1 open space, gardening garbage & water services included', 'Call for showing : Elizabeth', 'show contact info', 'Please call to schedule a appointment to comply with social distancing.', 'Appointment will be schedule 10 minutes apart.', '.', 'Please DO NOT DISTURB the tenants.', 'Nicely landscaped front yard.', 'RENTAL FEATURES', '________________________________________', '•\tLiving room', '•\tMaster bedroom and bath', '•\tRange / Oven', '•\tWasher and Dryer  On  site', '•\tGarbage disposal', '•\tRefrigerator', '•\t Dining area', '•\tPrivate Balcony', 'COMMUNITY FEATURES:', 'Nicely landscaped & professionally maintained, front yard.', 'Private side yard.', "Very close to college, downtown Hayward events, restaurants, farmer's market, theater and shopping.", 'Commuter  friendly location near BART Station, 92 to San Mateo Bridge, 238, 580 & 880.', 'PLEASE CALL ELIZABETH TO MAKE AN APPOINTMENT :', 'show contact info']
